settings.title: With the mission
settings.subtitle: “Explore the fun of building”
settings.text: Blokees believes that building can fuel endless creation and drive imagination. Blokees is dedicated to creating highly detailed model figures, kits, and collectables for all age groups—from younger kids to experienced collectors. We work with famous brands like Disney, Hasbro, Pokemon, Ultraman, Transformers, etc., to bring your favourite characters to life with amazing detail and functionality. We’re here to bring amazing collectables to consumers worldwide.
